summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 31471, creating Local Improvement District No. 2670, entitled: "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Southlake Avenue as laid out and extended by Ordinance No. 20186, from Eastlake Avenue to Boren Avenue; Galer Street from Eastlake Avenue to Southlake Avenue; Valley Street from Fairview Avenue to Westlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same; by constructing bridge roadways where necessary; by providing for the necessary surface drainage; by piling and planking the same where necessary, all in accordance with Resolution No. 30815 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", approved June 18, 1913 and published June 23, 1913.
